fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Convert any other player in the game. They will turn into ANY role that can still win the game (i.e if a role has already won, or physically cannot win the game, reroll the conversion)
- You will know their new role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If this slot is converted, it keeps the ability and attribute of this role, but gains the new wincon. Can be converted again, no matter what.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert 3 people and see one of them win
